                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String username,
                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String password)
                                                                                                                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Parameters:
        topics - A List of topics entered by the user
        username - A String representing the username of the user
        password - A String representing the password of the user

        An ArrayList of ArrayList of ArrayList of ArrayList of String containing the MCQQuestions with their MCQChoices

      • mcqQuestion

        public static double mcqQuestion(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> tempList,
                                 double total,
                                 int i)
        This function will perform a quiz with the ArrayList of ArrayList of String passed as parameters and will return the final grade of the user
        Parameters:
        tempList - The ArrayList of ArrayList of String representing the MCQQuestions retrieved from the databases with their MCQChoices
        total - A double representing the initial grade of the user
        i - An int representing the starting number of MCQQuestions
        Returns:
        A double representing the grade of the user after performing MCQQuestions
